dsOverview.title: Historical Monthly Gridded Global Land Precipitation Climatology

summary.p: A historic monthly gridded precipitation dataset for global land areas. This dataset contains monthly precipitation from station rain gauges which have been averaged for geographic boxes for January, 1900 through December, 1998. The data is available for both a 5 degree by 5 degree grid and a 2.5 degree latitude by 3.75 degree longitude grid, but values are only available over land.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UEA/CRU > Climatic Research Unit, University of East Anglia

dsOverview.author: M. Hulme
dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount
